snippet: During a cabinet meeting held in the Israeli-controlled portion of the territory, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called on the world to recognize Israel’s sovereignty there.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, during cabinet meeting in Israeli-controlled portion of Golan Heights, asserts that world must recognize Israeli sovereignty over conquered territory and pledges to never return it to Syria; remarks come as Geneva resumes talks over Syria's future.
lead_paragraph: During a cabinet meeting held in the Israeli-controlled portion of the territory, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called on the world to recognize Israel’s sovereignty there.

headline.main: Israel Will Never Give Golan Heights to Syria, Netanyahu Vows
headline.print_headline: Israel Will Never Give Golan to Syria, Netanyahu Vows
